00018 #ifndef _PAIR_DUMP_H
00019 #define _PAIR_DUMP_H
00020 
00021 #include <votca/ctp/qmpair.h>
00022 #include <votca/ctp/paircalculator.h>
00023 #include <sys/stat.h>
00024 #include <votca/csg/trajectorywriter.h>
00025 
00026 namespace votca { namespace ctp {
00034 class PairDump : public PairCalculator
00035 {
00036 public:
00037     PairDump() {};
00038     ~PairDump() {};
00039 
00040     const char *Description() { return "Write pairs for DFT integral input"; }
00041 
00042     void EvaluateSite(QMTopology *top, QMCrgUnit *crg);
00043     void EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair);
00044     bool EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top);
00045     void EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top);
00046 
00047    void Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options);
00048 
00049 protected:
00050     TrajectoryWriter *_writer;
00051     string _format; // extension for writing files
00052     string _framedir;
00053     bool _subfolders;
00054     bool _mols;
00055     bool _pairs;
00056 };
00057 
00058 inline void PairDump::Initialize(QMTopology *top, Property *options)
00059 {
00060     _format = "pdb";
00061     if(options->exists("options.pairdump.format"))
00062             _format = options->get("options.pairdump.format").as<string>();
00063     _subfolders=false;
00064     if(options->exists("options.pairdump.subfolders"))
00065             _subfolders= options->get("options.pairdump.subfolders").as<bool>();
00066     _mols=false;
00067     _pairs=true;
00068     if(options->exists("options.pairdump.molecules"))
00069             _mols = options->get("options.pairdump.molecules").as<bool>();
00070     if(options->exists("options.pairdump.pairs"))
00071             _pairs = options->get("options.pairdump.pairs").as<bool>();
00072         
00073 }
00074 
00075 inline bool PairDump::EvaluateFrame(QMTopology *top) {
00076     _writer = TrjWriterFactory().Create("." + _format);
00077     if(_writer == NULL)
00078         throw runtime_error(string("output format not supported: ") + _format);
00079     _framedir=string("frame")+boost::lexical_cast<string>(top->getStep()+1) +string("/") ;
00080     mkdir(_framedir.c_str(),0755);
00081     
00082     if(_pairs)
00083         PairCalculator::EvaluateFrame(top);
00084 
00085     if(!_mols) return true;
00086     vector<QMCrgUnit*>& crglist = top->CrgUnits();
00087     for(vector<QMCrgUnit*>::iterator iter = crglist.begin();iter!=crglist.end();++iter)
00088         EvaluateSite(top, *iter);
00089     return true;
00090 }
00091 
00092 inline void PairDump::EndEvaluate(QMTopology *top)
00093 {
00094     delete _writer;
00095 }
00096 
00097 inline void PairDump::EvaluateSite(QMTopology *top, QMCrgUnit *crg)
00098 {
00099     Topology atop;
00100 
00101     top->AddAtomisticBeads(crg,&atop);
00102     string subdir = _framedir;
00103     if(_subfolders) {
00104         subdir=subdir + "mol_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(crg->getId()) + "/";
00105         mkdir(subdir.c_str(),0755);
00106     }
00107 
00108     string file = subdir
00109             + "mol_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(crg->getId()) + "."  + _format;
00110     _writer->Open(file);
00111     _writer->Write(&atop);
00112     _writer->Close();
00113 }
00114 
00115 inline void PairDump::EvaluatePair(QMTopology *top, QMPair *pair){
00116     Topology atop;
00117 
00118     CrgUnit *crg1 = pair->Crg1PBCCopy();
00119     CrgUnit *crg2 = pair->Crg2PBCCopy();
00120 
00121     top->AddAtomisticBeads(crg1,&atop);
00122     top->AddAtomisticBeads(crg2,&atop);
00123 
00124     string subdir = _framedir;
00125     if(_subfolders) {
00126         subdir=subdir+
00127             + "pair_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(crg1->getId()) + string("_")
00128             + boost::lexical_cast<string>(crg2->getId()) + "/";
00129         mkdir(subdir.c_str(),0755);
00130         subdir=subdir+"dim/";
00131         mkdir(subdir.c_str(),0755);
00132     }
00133 
00134     string file = subdir
00135             + "pair_" + boost::lexical_cast<string>(crg1->getId()) + string("_")
00136             + boost::lexical_cast<string>(crg2->getId()) + "."  + _format;
00137     _writer->Open(file);
00138     _writer->Write(&atop);
00139     _writer->Close();
00140 }
00141 
00142 }}
